After a second attempt on the senator's life was made, Skywalker was assigned to protect her back on her homeworld of Naboo. There the two secretly started to fall in love which, coupled with Skywalker's later [discovery](/wiki/Mission_to_rescue_Shmi_Skywalker_Lars "Mission to rescue Shmi Skywalker Lars") of his mother [Shmi's](/wiki/Shmi_Skywalker_Lars "Shmi Skywalker Lars") death at the hands of [Tusken Raiders](/wiki/Tusken_Raider "Tusken Raider") on the planet Tatooine, would bring the young Jedi ever closer to the dark side of the force, and even more vulnerable to Sidious' deceptive machinations.[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_II-13)

 [![Secession gave way to the Clone Wars, allowing Palpatine to create the Grand Army of the Republic with his emergency powers.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/48/Parade.png/revision/latest?cb=20180211191423) [![Secession gave way to the Clone Wars, allowing Palpatine to create the Grand Army of the Republic with his emergency powers.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/48/Parade.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180211191423)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/48/Parade.png/revision/latest?cb=20180211191423) 

Secession gave way to the Clone Wars, allowing Palpatine to create the Grand Army of the Republic with his emergency powers.

 

However, when it was revealed that the Separatists were secretly building a battle droid army with the support of many commercial organizations, including the Trade Federation. Palpatine used the situation to have himself granted emergency powers from the Senate by Representative Jar Jar Binks. Palpatine feigned reluctance to accept this authority, promising to return it to the Senate once the crisis ended. His first act was to allow the use of the clone army, which had been [discovered](/wiki/Mission_to_Kamino_(Separatist_Crisis) "Mission to Kamino (Separatist Crisis)") by Kenobi on Kamino, to counter the Separatist threat; this resulted in the [First Battle of Geonosis](/wiki/First_Battle_of_Geonosis "First Battle of Geonosis"), which served as the opening salvo of the [Clone Wars](/wiki/Clone_Wars "Clone Wars"). After clone template Jango Fett was killed and his Separatist partners escaped the battle, Tyranus met with Sidious at the Coruscant tower in the Works with good news that the war the Sith had been orchestrating had begun, as well as preliminary blueprints for a Geonosian [superweapon](/wiki/DS-1_Orbital_Battle_Station "DS-1 Orbital Battle Station") that could be of use to their future Sith-led regime. Sidious was pleased with the turn of events, and he later, with the leaders of the Senate, oversaw the new Republic army marching towards war, while Palpatine additionally would be able to deceive both sides from the start of the war. Skywalker and Amidala secretly [wed](/wiki/Wedding_of_Anakin_Skywalker_and_Padm%C3%A9_Amidala "Wedding of Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala") on Naboo. The sole witnesses[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_II-13) to the clandestine ceremony were their two droids, [C-3PO](/wiki/C-3PO "C-3PO") and [R2-D2](/wiki/R2-D2 "R2-D2"), and a [local holy man](/wiki/Maxiron_Agolerga "Maxiron Agolerga") who officiated the rite.[[24]](#cite_note-CL2016-24) However, the secret was unknowingly passed to Sidious, which the Sith Lord would later use during his quest to lure Skywalker into becoming his next apprentice.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

##### Converting future servants

:   "*I enjoyed our talk, Iskat Akaris, and I will take your thoughts into consideration. I feel certain you have a bright future ahead of you.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine, to Iskat Akaris[[86]](#cite_note-Inquisitor:_Rise_of_the_Red_Blade-86)

At some point, Sidious infiltrated the Jedi Temple with a number of agents, including the former Padawan [Heezo](/wiki/Heezo "Heezo"), ordering them to identify Jedi dissatisfied with the Order and covertly nudge them towards the dark side. Shortly after the [mission to Thule](/wiki/Mission_to_Thule "Mission to Thule"), he met with the Jedi High Council. On his way to their [chamber](/wiki/Jedi_Council_Chamber "Jedi Council Chamber"), he was escorted by one such Jedi, the Knight [Iskat Akaris](/wiki/Thirteenth_Sister "Thirteenth Sister"). Sidious took advantage of the opportunity by getting her to voice her secretly held opinions of the Order to him while subtly encouraging her darker impulses. Palpatine would be escorted by Akaris to meet with the Council several more times throughout the Clone Wars.[[86]](#cite_note-Inquisitor:_Rise_of_the_Red_Blade-86)

Meanwhile, a new cropping of senators would emerge as wartime-elected representatives. This new grouping of senators were much more likely than their pre-existing counterparts to support Palpatine. In fact, Palpatine handpicked some of the senators who came into the government during the war, yet even those who had not been selected by the Chancellor would display a great reverence for the man.[[87]](#cite_note-MoF-87)

##### Negotiations with the Hutts

:   "*Soon, the Jedi will not only be at war with you, Count, but the Hutt Clan as well.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious, to Darth Tyranus — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fb/WithTheHuttClanAsWell-TCWf.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250404190521)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:WithTheHuttClanAsWell-TCWf.flac "File:WithTheHuttClanAsWell-TCWf.flac"))[[88]](#cite_note-TCW_film-88)

 [![Sidious and Tyranus controlled both sides in the galactic conflict as Chancellor Palpatine and Count Dooku.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/af/Count_Dooku_speaks_with_Darth_Sidious.png/revision/latest?cb=20180814124848) [![Sidious and Tyranus controlled both sides in the galactic conflict as Chancellor Palpatine and Count Dooku.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/af/Count_Dooku_speaks_with_Darth_Sidious.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180814124848)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/af/Count_Dooku_speaks_with_Darth_Sidious.png/revision/latest?cb=20180814124848) 

Sidious and Tyranus controlled both sides in the galactic conflict as Chancellor Palpatine and Count Dooku.

 

After the Confederacy's Droid Army seized control of the major [hyperspace lanes](/wiki/Hyperspace_route "Hyperspace route"), Sidious had Tyranus and his assassin, [Asajj Ventress](/wiki/Asajj_Ventress "Asajj Ventress"), kidnap the [Hutt Clans](/wiki/Hutt_Clan "Hutt Clan")' [Council](/wiki/Grand_Hutt_Council "Grand Hutt Council") leader, [Jabba's](/wiki/Jabba_Desilijic_Tiure "Jabba Desilijic Tiure") son, [Rotta](/wiki/Rotta "Rotta"). Once they had reached [Teth](/wiki/Teth "Teth"), Sidious contacted both Ventress and Tyranus. He assured them that the Jedi would be at war with the Hutts as well as the Confederacy. As Palpatine, he then received a message from Jabba, asking for help in rescuing his son. Despite Master Windu's reservations about allying the Republic with the Hutt, Palpatine knew they needed the Hutt's space lanes to move their troops. Despite General Grievous spreading the Republic forces thin, Windu told Palpatine that Skywalker and Kenobi could carry out the rescue.[[88]](#cite_note-TCW_film-88)

The eruption of several new battles across the Outer Rim, including those relating the Hutt endeavor, gave Palpatine the ability to implement a series of new secruity measures on Naboo, something that came to Senator Amidala's attention and resulted in her requesting a chance to speak with the Chancellor. During the rescue, Palpatine learned that Jabba believed that the Jedi were behind his son's kidnapping and told Amidala of this when she arrived to discuss his new security plans. Jabba refused to speak with him, so Amidala decided to speak with Jabba's uncle [Ziro](/wiki/Ziro_Desilijic_Tiure "Ziro Desilijic Tiure") at his [palace](/wiki/Ziro%27s_Palace "Ziro's Palace"), despite Palpatine's warning. Kenobi, Skywalker, and his new Padawan, [Ahsoka Tano](/wiki/Ahsoka_Tano "Ahsoka Tano"), were able to return Rotta to his father and secure a treaty with the Hutts. Following the events, Sidious spoke with his apprentice about this setback. He assured Tyranus that the war was turning in their favor.[[88]](#cite_note-TCW_film-88)

##### Gunray's capture

:   "*Gunray's capture could be a serious threat to us, my friend.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious, to Darth Tyranus[[89]](#cite_note-Cloak_of_Darkness-89)

Palpatine learned that Senator Amidala had moved through enemy territory into the Outer Rim, causing him to contact her aboard her [H-type Nubian yacht](/wiki/H-type_Nubian_yacht "H-type Nubian yacht"). Amidala explained that an old family friend, Senator Farr of [Rodia](/wiki/Rodia "Rodia"), had asked for her personally, as his people were starving. Palpatine claimed to understand, although he argued that she should have a clone trooper escort. However, Amidala had trust in diplomacy. After Representative Binks tried to talk to Palpatine, he caused C-3PO's chair to move, knocking the Gungan down and causing the ship to veer off course. Amidala was able to regain control, but Palpatine discreetly urged her to keep Binks out of the negotiations, which she agreed to.[[90]](#cite_note-Bombad_Jedi-90)

 [![Sidious ordered Tyranus to retrieve Nute Gunray, not wanting the Jedi to learn of what he knew.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/Sidious_Dooku_Talk_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20120923030000) [![Sidious ordered Tyranus to retrieve Nute Gunray, not wanting the Jedi to learn of what he knew.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/Sidious_Dooku_Talk_2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120923030000)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/Sidious_Dooku_Talk_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20120923030000) 

Sidious ordered Tyranus to retrieve Nute Gunray, not wanting the Jedi to learn of what he knew.

 

Yet once Amidala was planet-side, she learned Farr had joined the Separatists to help his people, and she was captured by Nute Gunray's battle droids. However, Binks helped disrupt the Separatist's plans and Farr decided to side with the Republic. Thanks to a message sent by C-3PO, the [41st Elite Corps](/wiki/41st_Elite_Corps "41st Elite Corps") arrived on the planet and captured Gunray. Palpatine contacted them via hologram, stating that Amidala had brought Rodia's needs to his attention. The Chancellor had deployed a [convoy](/wiki/Convoy "Convoy") of supply ships and stated that Gunray's capture was a major Republic victory.[[90]](#cite_note-Bombad_Jedi-90)

However, the secret Sith Lord saw the danger Nute Gunray's capture posed, as the viceroy would not last under the Jedi's questioning. Contacting Darth Tyranus, Sidious was informed by his apprentice that Asajj Ventress could infiltrate the Republic warship, allowing her to rescue or kill Gunray. While Sidious was apprehensive about using an agent who had previously failed them in the past, Tyranus argued that she was a skilled assassin. Ultimately, the master allowed his pupil to proceed in this plan; Ventress successfully [rescued](/wiki/Rescue_on_the_Tranquility "Rescue on the Tranquility") Nute Gunray, denying the Jedi and the Republic the opportunity to extract secret information from the Separatist leader, whilst also demonstrating her ability to handle a [Star Destroyer](/wiki/Star_Destroyer "Star Destroyer")'s contingent of clone troopers, a Jedi Padawan, and a Jedi Master all at once.[[89]](#cite_note-Cloak_of_Darkness-89)

##### Chancellor at war

:   "*With the final votes tallied, let it be known that the motion to stop the creation of more clone troops has failed, and the continued manufacturing of clone troopers shall proceed as scheduled.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine[[91]](#cite_note-Senate_Murders-91)

 [![As a result of the Clone Wars, the Republic became a militarized state under Chancellor Palpatine.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/51/PalpatineRepublicArmy.png/revision/latest?cb=20210702051029) [![As a result of the Clone Wars, the Republic became a militarized state under Chancellor Palpatine.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/51/PalpatineRepublicArmy.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210702051029)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/51/PalpatineRepublicArmy.png/revision/latest?cb=20210702051029) 

As a result of the Clone Wars, the Republic became a militarized state under Chancellor Palpatine.

 

As the war got underway, Dooku [crash-landed](/wiki/Skirmish_at_Vanqor "Skirmish at Vanqor") his ship on [Vanqor](/wiki/Vanqor "Vanqor") and was captured by the [Ohnaka Gang](/wiki/Ohnaka_Gang "Ohnaka Gang"). Kenobi and Skywalker were sent to verify their leader [Hondo Ohnaka](/wiki/Hondo_Ohnaka "Hondo Ohnaka")'s demand for a reward,[[92]](#cite_note-Dooku_Captured-92) and then sent Senator [Kharrus](/wiki/Kharrus "Kharrus") and Representative Binks to [deliver](/wiki/Mission_to_Florrum "Mission to Florrum") it. Ultimately, Dooku escaped from the [pirates](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate").[[93]](#cite_note-The_Gungan_General-93)

Sidious paid [Cad Bane](/wiki/Cad_Bane "Cad Bane") to [steal](/wiki/Raid_on_the_Jedi_Temple "Raid on the Jedi Temple") a [Holocron](/wiki/Holocron "Holocron") from the Jedi Temple's [Holocron Vault](/wiki/Holocron_Vault "Holocron Vault"),[[94]](#cite_note-Holocron_Heist-94) which when used in conjunction with the [kyber memory crystal](/wiki/Kyber_memory_crystal "Kyber memory crystal") would reveal the location of [Force-sensitive](/wiki/Force-sensitive "Force-sensitive") infants across the galaxy.[[95]](#cite_note-Cargo_of_Doom-95) He had Bane kidnap these children to his [facility](/wiki/Darth_Sidious%27s_secret_facility "Darth Sidious's secret facility") on [Mustafar](/wiki/Mustafar "Mustafar") to commence the [creation](/wiki/Project_Harvester "Project Harvester") of an army of Force-sensitive spies, Sidious told the nanny droids of the children's natural talent and how he would harness that power for his own needs. Looking into the future, Sidious saw a vision of Force talented spies trained in the dark side that would appear in every corner of the galaxy doing his bidding. The nanny droid told the Dark Lord that subjects rarely survive the procedure at a young age but Sidious said the risk was necessary and that if the procedure failed he would lose nothing. As the surgery was about to happen, an alert from a nanny droid told the Sith Lord of an incoming shuttle that was approaching and it did not belong to the bounty hunter. This surprised Sidious as he did not foresee this and ordered the droids to evacuate the children and destroy the facility to protect his identity and ended the transmission quickly. the Jedi foiled Bane and [rescued](/wiki/Mission_to_Mustafar_(Skywalker_and_Tano) "Mission to Mustafar (Skywalker and Tano)") the [younglings](/wiki/Youngling "Youngling").[[96]](#cite_note-Children_of_the_Force-96)

 [![Working with Doctor Sionver Boll, Palpatine ordered the termination of the Zillo Beast for purposes of scientific research.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0d/Dr_Boll_confers_with_Palpatine.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110923033553) [![Working with Doctor Sionver Boll, Palpatine ordered the termination of the Zillo Beast for purposes of scientific research.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0d/Dr_Boll_confers_with_Palpatine.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110923033553)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0d/Dr_Boll_confers_with_Palpatine.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110923033553) 

Working with Doctor Sionver Boll, Palpatine ordered the termination of the Zillo Beast for purposes of scientific research.

 

During the [Battle of Malastare](/wiki/Battle_of_Malastare "Battle of Malastare"), the [Zillo Beast](/wiki/Zillo_Beast "Zillo Beast") was inadvertently awakened and Palpatine wanted the creature killed, but changed his mind when [Doctor](/wiki/Doctor "Doctor") [Sionver Boll](/wiki/Sionver_Boll "Sionver Boll") and Skywalker pointed out the beast's indestructible hide could prove fruitful if analyzed. The Zillo Beast was instead rendered unconscious, and transported to Coruscant. It broke out of its restraints and [rampaged](/wiki/Zillo_Beast_incident "Zillo Beast incident") through the [Senate District](/wiki/Federal_District "Federal District") before being killed with [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") gas. Palpatine ordered Boll to clone the animal.[[97]](#cite_note-The_Zillo_Beast-97)[[98]](#cite_note-The_Zillo_Beast_Strikes_Back-98)

During the [Senate hostage crisis](/wiki/Senate_hostage_crisis "Senate hostage crisis"), Cad Bane demanded Ziro the Hutt be released from [prison](/wiki/Republic_Judiciary_Central_Detention_Center "Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center") in exchange for the hostages' release. Palpatine reluctantly complied after Skywalker was subdued by [Bane's gang](/wiki/Cad_Bane%27s_group "Cad Bane's group").[[99]](#cite_note-Hostage_Crisis-99)

The following year,[[100]](#cite_note-Canon_dates1-100) while the Senate was considering [deregulating](/wiki/Republic_financial_reform_bill "Republic financial reform bill") the banks to increase funding for the war. Palpatine was soon informed by Amidala that the [Separatist Senate](/wiki/Separatist_Senate "Separatist Senate"), led by [Mina Bonteri](/wiki/Mina_Bonteri "Mina Bonteri"), was considering [peace negotiations](/wiki/Confederate%E2%80%93Republic_peace_initiative "Confederate–Republic peace initiative"). Dooku had the [central power distribution grid](/wiki/Central_power_distribution_grid "Central power distribution grid") [bombed](/wiki/Bombing_of_Coruscant%27s_central_power_distribution_grid "Bombing of Coruscant's central power distribution grid"), and then staged another [attack](/wiki/Attack_on_Confederate_people "Attack on Confederate people") on the Confederacy, which killed Bonteri and was blamed on the Republic, dashing any hope of peace.[[101]](#cite_note-Heroes_on_Both_Sides-101)

 [![Palpatine reflected on Amidala's speech against the escalation of the Clone Wars, noting her ability to sway public opinion.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cd/Palpatine_Pursuite_of_Peace.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180809193840) [![Palpatine reflected on Amidala's speech against the escalation of the Clone Wars, noting her ability to sway public opinion.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cd/Palpatine_Pursuite_of_Peace.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180809193840)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cd/Palpatine_Pursuite_of_Peace.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180809193840) 

Palpatine reflected on Amidala's speech against the escalation of the Clone Wars, noting her ability to sway public opinion.

 

Desperate, Amidala attempted to rally support for opposing a new [bill](/wiki/Republic_military_enhancement_bill "Republic military enhancement bill") but found few willing to do so. Upon further investigation, Amidala found that many of the senators who voted in support have actually been blackmailed to do so. She also discovered that supporting the bill would mean bankrupting certain segments of the Republic such as their social programs, due to the Banking Clan's high interest rates. Pursued by assassins, Bail Organa, Onacondo Farr and Amidala continued attempting to oppose the bill with Amidala stepping up in front of the Senate. In her speech, she pointed out that passing the bill would harm the citizens it was supposedly attempting to protect. Her speech marshals loud respect and support from the Senate audience. Later, Palpatine expressed his displeasure to Mas Amedda, noting how the success of one individual's passionate voice can have over his power. Palpatine resolved to wait until fate and the Senate once more turn to favor him.[[102]](#cite_note-Pursuit_of_Peace-102)

 [![Palpatine attended the funeral of Senator Onaconda Farr, whose murder undermined Amidala's plans for a peaceful resolution of the Clone Wars.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b5/FarrFuneral.png/revision/latest?cb=20120909061508) [![Palpatine attended the funeral of Senator Onaconda Farr, whose murder undermined Amidala's plans for a peaceful resolution of the Clone Wars.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b5/FarrFuneral.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120909061508)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b5/FarrFuneral.png/revision/latest?cb=20120909061508) 

Palpatine attended the funeral of Senator Onaconda Farr, whose murder undermined Amidala's plans for a peaceful resolution of the Clone Wars.

 

When the military enhancement bill for more clone troopers was introduced, Palpatine claimed to be opposed to it. The bill encountered [minor but effective resistance](/wiki/Reduced_military_spending_bill "Reduced military spending bill"), although one of its greatest critics, [Onaconda Farr](/wiki/Onaconda_Farr "Onaconda Farr"), seemingly died of a heart failure before it could be voted on. Palpatine attended the [funeral](/wiki/Funeral_of_Onaconda_Farr "Funeral of Onaconda Farr"), but, in the Chancellor's office, he and others met with [inspector](/wiki/Inspector "Inspector") [Tanivos Exantor Divo](/wiki/Tanivos_Exantor_Divo "Tanivos Exantor Divo"), who revealed a poison had actually killed the senator. As the inspector left, the Chancellor claimed that murder in the Senate was unthinkable. Later, Palpatine and the others reunited in his office, where Divo nearly arrested the false suspect, the Kaminoan Senator [Halle Burtoni](/wiki/Halle_Burtoni "Halle Burtoni"). However, Amidala realized Farr's aide, [Lolo Purs](/wiki/Lolo_Purs "Lolo Purs"), was the true culprit, and the Rodian was arrested. Soon afterward, the military enhancement bill was passed; Palpatine claimed to a disappointed Amidala that he too was disappointed, but that democracy needed to be respected, and stated that, with more troops, the war could possibly end more quickly.[[91]](#cite_note-Senate_Murders-91)

Two years after the mission to Thule, Palpatine expressed his faith in the disgraced Jedi Knight Iskat Akaris to Master Yoda. This support, in tandem with that of Masters [Klefan Opus](/wiki/Klefan_Opus "Klefan Opus") and [Uumay Hawlatha](/wiki/Uumay_Hawlatha "Uumay Hawlatha"), proved enough to forestall Yoda's reservations as he and fellow Councilor Mace Windu decided in favor of putting Akaris back in the field.[[86]](#cite_note-Inquisitor:_Rise_of_the_Red_Blade-86)

During the [Battle of Sullust](/wiki/Battle_of_Sullust "Battle of Sullust"), Sidious felt Asajj Ventress growing stronger in the ways of the dark side of the Force. Through a hologram, Darth Sidious accused Tyranus of wanting to overthrow him as Dark Lord which shocked his apprentice who stated his loyalty belonged only to his Master. Sidious then demanded proof and ordered him to eliminate Ventress which the Count sadly obliged to. After assuming success in the death of his former disciple, Dooku contacted Sidious of his apparent success. Satisfied, Darth Sidious praised his apprentice for once again proving his loyalty. The two were unaware that Ventress survived.[[103]](#cite_note-Nightsisters-103)

Sidious ordered Tyranus to ally with the resurgent [Zygerrian Slave Empire](/wiki/Zygerrian_Slave_Empire "Zygerrian Slave Empire"), explaining past Sith Empires were built on the backs of slaves and theirs would be no exception.[[104]](#cite_note-Escape_from_Kadavo-104) They soon plotted for bounty hunters such as Cad Bane and [Rako Hardeen](/wiki/Rako_Hardeen "Rako Hardeen") to "kidnap" Palpatine during the [Festival of Light](/wiki/Festival_of_Light "Festival of Light") on Naboo. Kenobi infiltrated the plot and helped the Jedi to prevent it, lulling them into a false sense of security. Dooku showed up the evening after the festival but was [defeated](/wiki/Plan_to_kidnap_Chancellor_Palpatine "Plan to kidnap Chancellor Palpatine") and forced to flee.[[105]](#cite_note-Crisis_on_Naboo-105)

#### Late campaigns

##### Return of Darth Maul

:   "*Have mercy. Please. Please!*"  
    "*There* is *no mercy.*"
:   ―Maul and Darth Sidious[[106]](#cite_note-The_Lawless-106)

 [![Sensing a disturbance in the Force, Sidious traveled to Mandalore to confront Maul, his first apprentice.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/PalpatineSensesMaul-TL.png/revision/latest?cb=20131025200407) [![Sensing a disturbance in the Force, Sidious traveled to Mandalore to confront Maul, his first apprentice.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/PalpatineSensesMaul-TL.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20131025200407)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/PalpatineSensesMaul-TL.png/revision/latest?cb=20131025200407) 

Sensing a disturbance in the Force, Sidious traveled to Mandalore to confront Maul, his first apprentice.

 

The next year,[[107]](#cite_note-Canon_dates2-107) Maul returned to the galaxy after a decade of hiding, with his brother [Savage Opress](/wiki/Savage_Opress "Savage Opress") now acting as his apprentice. The Jedi were concerned but Palpatine disagreed, convincing Yoda that the Separatists should be their concern and that Maul's vendetta was a private matter for Kenobi to resolve.[[108]](#cite_note-Revival-108) When Maul [seized](/wiki/Takeover_of_Mandalore "Takeover of Mandalore") control of [Mandalore](/wiki/Mandalore "Mandalore"), the most powerful planet in the [Council of Neutral Systems](/wiki/Council_of_Neutral_Systems "Council of Neutral Systems"), Sidious realized that Maul had grown too dangerous and was a threat to his future conquest of the galaxy. Deciding to end the threat personally, Sidious had his [shuttle](/wiki/Darth_Sidious%27_Eta-class_shuttle "Darth Sidious' Eta-class shuttle") flown to [Sundari](/wiki/Sundari "Sundari"), where he confronted Maul and Opress.[[106]](#cite_note-The_Lawless-106)

 [![Sidious defeated Maul and killed Savage Opress, putting an end to their challenge to the reigning Sith Lords.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a0/SidiousVsNightbrothers-TL.png/revision/latest?cb=20131025201653) [![Sidious defeated Maul and killed Savage Opress, putting an end to their challenge to the reigning Sith Lords.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a0/SidiousVsNightbrothers-TL.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20131025201653)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a0/SidiousVsNightbrothers-TL.png/revision/latest?cb=20131025201653) 

Sidious defeated Maul and killed Savage Opress, putting an end to their challenge to the reigning Sith Lords.

 

Not fooled by Maul's attempts to become his apprentice once again, Sidious [engaged](/wiki/Battle_of_Mandalore "Battle of Mandalore") the rival Sith Lords in combat. Sidious proved himself to be not only a match for their combined strength but also superior, as after a prolonged duel, he separated the brothers by first bypassing Savage's defense and knocking him away with a kick and then force-pushed Maul, briefly knocking him out. Sidious then briefly toyed with Savage, not even bothering to engage, before he then began battling him again and soundly slayed Opress in single combat. Not bothering to prevent Maul from going to his brother, knowing it was too late for him to do anything to save Savage after Opress finally succumbed, Sidious taunted Maul again, reminding him of the ancient rules of the Sith and how Maul had been replaced before he then once again engaged his former apprentice. Although Sidious found Maul to be far more ferocious than Savage, he ultimately won the final blade lock and brought Maul to his knees, but chose not to kill him, foreseeing that his fallen apprentice could be useful to him in the near future.[[106]](#cite_note-The_Lawless-106)

##### Trial of Ahsoka Tano

:   "*I'm sure many of you look at this former Jedi and think, 'Surely she cannot be this murderer or saboteur that they speak of.' And yet think of all the times we have been fooled by the Separatists and how they have infiltrated the Republic, and ask yourself, 'Is this yet another Separatist scheme?' Another way to rip the Jedi, and subsequently all of us, apart.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine[[109]](#cite_note-The_Wrong_Jedi-109)

 [![Palpatine presided over the trial of Ahsoka Tano, a Jedi framed for treason.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/PalpatineRedGuard-TWJ.png/revision/latest?cb=20131029023412) [![Palpatine presided over the trial of Ahsoka Tano, a Jedi framed for treason.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/PalpatineRedGuard-TWJ.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20131029023412)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/PalpatineRedGuard-TWJ.png/revision/latest?cb=20131029023412) 

Palpatine presided over the trial of Ahsoka Tano, a Jedi framed for treason.

 

Chancellor Palpatine served as the judge of the [trial of Ahsoka Tano](/wiki/Trial_of_Ahsoka_Tano "Trial of Ahsoka Tano"), who was accused of masterminding a [bombing](/wiki/Bombing_of_the_Jedi_Temple_hangar "Bombing of the Jedi Temple hangar") at the Jedi Temple. Flanked by two crimson-robed guards, he listened while Senator Amidala and Admiral Tarkin made their arguments as the defense and the prosecutor, respectively. When they had finished, the Chancellor delivered a speech warning the court to beware of Separatist schemes that aimed to undermine the Jedi Order, and by extension, the Galactic Republic, from within. Before he could announce the verdict, however, Skywalker interrupted with [Barriss Offee](/wiki/Barriss_Offee "Barriss Offee"), who confessed to the crime. Palpatine ordered Offee taken away, and Tano was acquitted.[[109]](#cite_note-The_Wrong_Jedi-109) The ordeal left Tano disillusioned and she refused an offer to rejoin the Jedi Order.

##### Manipulating two sides

:   "*Each day, we grow closer and closer to victory.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine[[110]](#cite_note-Orders-110)

 [![Faced with a conspiracy involving the clone army, Palpatine ordered that the evidence be brought to him on Coruscant.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/de/Informing_Palpatine_of_Tups_death.png/revision/latest?cb=20180820163326) [![Faced with a conspiracy involving the clone army, Palpatine ordered that the evidence be brought to him on Coruscant.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/de/Informing_Palpatine_of_Tups_death.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180820163326)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/de/Informing_Palpatine_of_Tups_death.png/revision/latest?cb=20180820163326) 

Faced with a conspiracy involving the clone army, Palpatine ordered that the evidence be brought to him on Coruscant.

 

During the [Battle of Ringo Vinda](/wiki/Battle_of_Ringo_Vinda "Battle of Ringo Vinda"), the clone trooper [CT-5385](/wiki/Tup "Tup") "Tup" suddenly faltered, becoming confused, betraying and killing the Jedi Master [Tiplar](/wiki/Tiplar "Tiplar"), before ultimately succumbing to insanity and dying himself. This incident was instigated by a faulty biochip, inserted into clones for the purpose of enforcing loyalty to the Supreme Chancellor and which laid the groundwork for their execution of Protocol 66. With his plans threatened, Sidious, as Chancellor Palpatine, had Tup's body taken to the [Grand Republic Medical Facility](/wiki/Grand_Republic_Medical_Facility "Grand Republic Medical Facility") for autopsy.[[75]](#cite_note-Conspiracy-75) [Shaak Ti](/wiki/Shaak_Ti "Shaak Ti") and [Nala Se](/wiki/Nala_Se "Nala Se") brought the rebellious clone [CT-5555](/wiki/Fives "Fives") "Fives" to Palpatine, who had uncovered the inhibitor chips implanted in each clone trooper, and believed them to be part of a Separatist conspiracy. The Chancellor informed Fives of his involvement with the chips and had his guards stage an attack, making Fives look dangerous to the Republic and discrediting him. Following Fives' death, he informed the Jedi that a parasite native to Ringo Vinda was responsible for Tup and Fives's behavior, for which all of the clone troopers would be inoculated against.[[110]](#cite_note-Orders-110) Sidious furthered the beneficiary opportunities from this series of events as he transferred the bulk of his [Sith artifact collection](/wiki/Darth_Sidious%27_collection "Darth Sidious' collection") to the Medical Facility from an abandoned store-house in the Works district, where the elusive Sith feared the Jedi may discover.[[24]](#cite_note-CL2016-24)

During a [diplomatic mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Scipio "Mission to Scipio") to [Scipio](/wiki/Scipio "Scipio"), Senator Padmé Amidala learned from [Rush Clovis](/wiki/Rush_Clovis "Rush Clovis") that the [InterGalactic Banking Clan](/wiki/InterGalactic_Banking_Clan "InterGalactic Banking Clan") had gone bankrupt. Palpatine told her to trust Clovis while hiring the bounty hunter [Embo](/wiki/Embo "Embo") to target them on the Clan's apparent behalf.[[111]](#cite_note-An_Old_Friend-111) Sidious and Tyranus agreed to make Clovis the new head of the Banking Clan: the [Muun](/wiki/Muun "Muun") government arrested the [Core Five](/wiki/Core_Five "Core Five"), and Clovis was elected by a Senate majority to replace them.[[112]](#cite_note-The_Rise_of_Clovis-112) Dooku blackmailed Clovis into raising the Republic's interest rates and sent a fleet to blockade Scipio, to which Palpatine responded by sending a fleet commanded by Skywalker. As Scipio fell under the Republic's control and Clovis committed [suicide](/wiki/Death "Death"), the Muuns ceded control of the banks to the [Office of the Chancellor](/wiki/Office_of_the_Chancellor "Office of the Chancellor").[[113]](#cite_note-Crisis_at_the_Heart-113)

##### Queen Julia's request

:   "*Queen Julia, the Republic is honored that you have come to us for aid. We are always happy to support the neutral systems in a time of crisis.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine[[114]](#cite_note-The_Disappeared,_Part_I-114)

When Queen [Julia](/wiki/Julia "Julia") of [Bardotta](/wiki/Bardotta "Bardotta") requested assistance from the Senate regarding the disappearance of several [Dagoyan Masters](/wiki/Dagoyan_Order "Dagoyan Order"), Palpatine offered to send [Bail Organa](/wiki/Bail_Prestor_Organa "Bail Prestor Organa") and Senator Amidala, but she insisted the aid of Representative Binks. Palpatine informed the Jedi Council, who deemed it unwise, so Master Windu volunteered to accompany him.[[114]](#cite_note-The_Disappeared,_Part_I-114)

##### Sifo-Dyas' secret

:   "*Master Sifo-Dyas? Forgive me. I'm afraid I am not familiar with that name.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine, to Yoda[[49]](#cite_note-TLO-49)

 [![Sidious ordered Tyranus to prevent the Jedi from discovering the Sith's plans.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8b/Sid_puts_the_squeeze_on_Tyranus.png/revision/latest?cb=20200225050654) [![Sidious ordered Tyranus to prevent the Jedi from discovering the Sith's plans.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8b/Sid_puts_the_squeeze_on_Tyranus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200225050654)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8b/Sid_puts_the_squeeze_on_Tyranus.png/revision/latest?cb=20200225050654) 

Sidious ordered Tyranus to prevent the Jedi from discovering the Sith's plans.

 

Palpatine was visited by Yoda when the Jedi discovered [Sifo-Dyas's lightsaber](/wiki/Sifo-Dyas%27s_lightsaber "Sifo-Dyas's lightsaber") at the location of a distress beacon: apparently, Sifo-Dyas had died on a mission to [Felucia](/wiki/Felucia "Felucia"), but details were sealed by the Office of the Chancellor. Palpatine told Yoda to consult former Supreme Chancellor Finis Valorum, since he was still a Senator at the time. Sidious then went to berate Tyranus via hologram over this loose end, ordering him to sort it out. Vexed by Tyranus' carelessness, Sidious Force choked his apprentice, warning him to remember the price for failure. Dooku prevented Kenobi and Skywalker from learning who killed Sifo-Dyas, but they still deduced the Sith were responsible for the creation of the clone army.[[49]](#cite_note-TLO-49)

##### Yoda's journey to Moraband

:   "*Save him, Jedi? Can you save him? Why not let him go? Let him die, and you can stop all that I will do.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious, to Yoda, about Anakin Skywalker[[39]](#cite_note-Sacrifice-39)

 [![Sidious and Tyranus used Sith sorcery while attempting to undermine the resolve of Grand Master Yoda.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/ca/Dark_side_ritual.png/revision/latest?cb=20200224025856) [![Sidious and Tyranus used Sith sorcery while attempting to undermine the resolve of Grand Master Yoda.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/ca/Dark_side_ritual.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200224025856)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/ca/Dark_side_ritual.png/revision/latest?cb=20200224025856) 

Sidious and Tyranus used Sith sorcery while attempting to undermine the resolve of Grand Master Yoda.

 

When Yoda entered the [Valley of the Dark Lords](/wiki/Valley_of_the_Dark_Lords "Valley of the Dark Lords") on [Moraband](/wiki/Moraband "Moraband") during a quest to uncover [immortality](/wiki/Force_spirit "Force spirit"), Sidious and Tyranus sensed his presence and convened at the Works on Coruscant. Greeting his apprentice once he arrived, Sidious led Tyranus to the tower's ceremonial chamber. Exploiting Tyranus and Yoda's Force-bond, Sidious used a [Balc](/wiki/Balc "Balc") incantation to cast a [dark illusion](/wiki/Dark_illusion "Dark illusion") to ensnare the Jedi Master. Using Sifo-Dyas' visage, he offered to reveal his identity if he would join him, but Yoda refused. The illusion then made it seem that they were in the Works pursuing the Sith Lords with Anakin Skywalker and the [501st Legion](/wiki/501st_Legion "501st Legion"). Sidious dueled Yoda on the catwalks outside the tower, with Skywalker arriving outside shortly after. Sidious rendered Skywalker unconscious with [Force lightning](/wiki/Force_lightning "Force lightning") while he continued fighting Yoda. As the illusion unfolded, Yoda refused to sacrifice Skywalker to pursue Sidious, and instead demonstrated he was willing to sacrifice himself to save the Chosen One. Sidious' illusion faltered: the Jedi Master won. Defeated, Sidious stated that they would need more time to defeat the Jedi.[[39]](#cite_note-Sacrifice-39)

##### Business on Utapau

When he learned the otherwise unremarkable planet [Utapau](/wiki/Utapau "Utapau") had produced a massive [kyber crystal](/wiki/Kyber_crystal "Kyber crystal"), the world became of interest to Sidious, as he wanted the large crystal for his battle station project.[[115]](#cite_note-Helmet_Collection_35-115) With the crystal in the hands of a [Sugi](/wiki/Sugi "Sugi") [arms dealing group](/wiki/Endente%27s_arms_dealing_group "Endente's arms dealing group"), Dooku agreed to a sale, claiming he wanted the crystal for the Separatist Alliance.[[116]](#cite_note-In_Search_of_the_Crystal-116) Grievous himself arrived to oversee the deal, ultimately killing the Sugi leader, [Endente](/wiki/Endente "Endente"), and taking the crystal to his Separatist fleet.[[117]](#cite_note-Crisis-117) However, after they had [arrived on Utapau](/wiki/Mission_to_Utapau "Mission to Utapau") to investigate the death of Jedi Master [Tu-Anh](/wiki/Tu-Anh "Tu-Anh"),[[118]](#cite_note-A_Death_on_Utapau-118) Kenobi and Skywalker fought to stop the Separatist operation, pursuing the crystal into space and destroying it aboard Grievous's [Dual Hemisphere-Omni Support Vessel](/wiki/Dual_Hemisphere-Omni_Support_Vessel "Dual Hemisphere-Omni Support Vessel"). Nevertheless, Yoda feared that Sidious was planning to create a superweapon,[[119]](#cite_note-The_Big_Bang-119) and Sidious remained interested in Utapau. Thus, the planet was targeted to be occupied, which would allow a crystal search to begin.[[115]](#cite_note-Helmet_Collection_35-115) Within months,[[120]](#cite_note-Helmet_Collection_61-120) the Separatists [invaded](/wiki/Invasion_of_Utapau "Invasion of Utapau") the world.[[121]](#cite_note-Grievous_wheel_bike-121)

##### Battle with Maul and Talzin

:   "*At last. The great deceiver comes to rescue his pawn.*"  
    "*I come to end this farce once and for all.*"
:   ―Maul and Darth Sidious[[20]](#cite_note-SonOfDathomir4-20)

 [![Sidious secured his plan for the galaxy by defeating his rivals Maul and Mother Talzin.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fd/SWDarthMaulDathomir-4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128063717) [![Sidious secured his plan for the galaxy by defeating his rivals Maul and Mother Talzin.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fd/SWDarthMaulDathomir-4.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190128063717)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/fd/SWDarthMaulDathomir-4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128063717) 

Sidious secured his plan for the galaxy by defeating his rivals Maul and Mother Talzin.

 

Meanwhile, Sidious wanted to use Maul to draw out Mother Talzin, the Nightsister witch who could pose a threat to his plans. His [operations against Talzin](/wiki/Campaign_against_the_Shadow_Collective "Campaign against the Shadow Collective") began when [Mandalorian super commandos](/wiki/Mandalorian_super_commando "Mandalorian super commando") broke Maul out of his im[prisonment](/wiki/Prison "Prison") in the [Spire](/wiki/Spire_(Stygeon_Prime) "Spire (Stygeon Prime)") on [Stygeon Prime](/wiki/Stygeon_Prime "Stygeon Prime").[[122]](#cite_note-SonOfDathomir1-122) Maul called on Mother Talzin for help after [General](/wiki/General "General") Grievous [defeated](/wiki/Battle_of_Zanbar "Battle of Zanbar") his forces at [Zanbar](/wiki/Zanbar "Zanbar"), precisely what Sidious and Dooku wanted. Talzin foresaw this and ordered her son to draw the Separatists to [Ord Mantell](/wiki/Ord_Mantell "Ord Mantell"), where he defeated and captured Dooku.[[123]](#cite_note-SonOfDathomir2-123) Maul contacted Sidious and informed him of their capture: the Sith Lord responded he should execute them, saying there were of no more use to him. Maul informed Dooku, goading him into allying with him.[[37]](#cite_note-SonOfDathomir3-37)

Maul and Dooku flew to Dathomir, where Talzin intended to siphon Dooku's lifeforce to regain her physical body. Sidious and Grievous also arrived on the planet and [attacked](/wiki/Second_Battle_of_Dathomir "Second Battle of Dathomir") Maul and the Talzin-possessed Dooku. Talzin regained her physical body and fended off Sidious' lightning, sacrificing herself to allow her son to escape. Taking the opportunity, Grievous plunged two [lightsabers](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber") into her body, eliminating the foe of Sidious. Despite Maul's escape, Sidious was satisfied that the [Shadow Collective](/wiki/Shadow_Collective "Shadow Collective") had been destroyed.[[20]](#cite_note-SonOfDathomir4-20)

##### A Jedi renegade

:   "*Darth Tyranus found his final apprentice in the unconventional Jedi Knight Quinlan Vos.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious[[30]](#cite_note-Secrets_of_the_Sith-30)

Later, the Jedi sent [Quinlan Vos](/wiki/Quinlan_Vos "Quinlan Vos") to work with Ventress to kill Count Dooku. This mission was deemed Jedi business, so Palpatine was not informed. However, Skywalker was unsure if that was the correct decision, and he felt that the Jedi keeping secrets from the Chancellor was wrong. Eventually, aboard the Republic's [*Venator*-class Star Destroyer](/wiki/Venator-class_Star_Destroyer "Venator-class Star Destroyer") [*Vigilance*](/wiki/Vigilance_(Venator-class) "Vigilance (Venator-class)") in [orbit](/wiki/Orbit "Orbit") of [Christophsis](/wiki/Christophsis "Christophsis"), Vos, who had fallen to the dark side and tasked himself with becoming Dooku's apprentice so as to discover Darth Sidious' identity, and Dooku, held in captivity of several clone troopers and Jedi, including Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, had enlisted the assistance of Asajj Ventress in their escape.[[124]](#cite_note-Dark_Disciple-124)

The trio, however, crash-landed onto Christophsis under Republic pursuit, with the Count of Serenno suffering grievous injuries. Having sought shelter in a hidden Confederacy fortress, Tyranus contacted a long-awaiting Darth Sidious within a hologram communications chamber in seek of help, yet not before Vos and Ventress slipped in. Tyranus was thus forced to introduce Quinlan Vos, presenting the former Jedi as his "new assassin" to Sidious, who had customarily hidden his facial features behind his dark cowl, whilst Ventress remained hidden in the shadows. After expressing disapproval with his apprentice's new employ, Darth Sidious listened to Tyranus' plea for an evacuation ship as a [second battle of Christophsis](/wiki/Second_battle_of_Christophsis "Second battle of Christophsis") ensued with Skywalker leading the ruthless Republic onslaught. Giving only a vague answer, Sidious ended the holo-communication as the [Christophsis Separatist tower](/wiki/Christophsis_Separatist_tower "Christophsis Separatist tower") fell to Republic gunship fire. The battle resulted in an inevitable Separatist loss, and with Ventress' redemption through[[124]](#cite_note-Dark_Disciple-124) appearing to[[125]](#cite_note-TBB_article-125) sacrificing herself for her lover, Quinlan Vos, Tyranus' "new assassin" chose to allow Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi take him back to the Jedi Temple on Coruscant for reassessment. Meanwhile, as the Jedi took Vos, a ship sent by Darth Sidious arrived to retrieve Tyranus, letting the Separatist leader return to safety.[[124]](#cite_note-Dark_Disciple-124)

### Subverting the Republic

#### Most powerful chancellor in centuries

As per his plans to use the Clone Wars as an excuse to consolidate[[126]](#cite_note-The_End_of_the_Beginning-126) and centralize[[127]](#cite_note-CotR-127) his political power[[126]](#cite_note-The_End_of_the_Beginning-126) to make way for his reign as Emperor,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) Palpatine had become the most powerful Supreme Chancellor since the days of the [Ruusan Reformations](/wiki/Ruusan_Reformations "Ruusan Reformations") by the end of the conflict.[[127]](#cite_note-CotR-127) Using the war effort as his excuse, Palpatine had the [Galactic Constitution](/wiki/Galactic_Constitution "Galactic Constitution") amended multiple times during the conflict.[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128) One constitutional amendment known as the [Reflex Amendment](/wiki/Reflex_Amendment "Reflex Amendment") granted him near-absolute power over military affairs, thereby allowing him to bypass the Senate in such decisions.[[127]](#cite_note-CotR-127) Towards the end of the war,[[129]](#cite_note-OF84-129) Palpatine passed[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128) a constitutional amendment[[129]](#cite_note-OF84-129) known as the [Sector Governance Decree](/wiki/Sector_Governance_Decree "Sector Governance Decree").[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128)

Under the Sector Governance Decree, Palpatine created a new structure of regional governance[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128) by appointing certain individuals as governors. In theory, the decree was designed to shore up the war effort by uniting star systems into singular blocs and transforming their production centers into war-focused installations.[[129]](#cite_note-OF84-129) In reality, however, regional governors could become leaders of the systems they oversaw, allowing Palpatine to circumvent and one day disband the Senate by creating a new bureaucracy[[130]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-130) composed of individuals he sent out.[[129]](#cite_note-OF84-129) The decree, however, proved to be too much for senators who formed the [Delegation of 2,000](/wiki/Delegation_of_2,000 "Delegation of 2,000"), which quietly assembled the [Petition of 2,000](/wiki/Petition_of_2,000 "Petition of 2,000")[[127]](#cite_note-CotR-127) in the name of protesting Palpatine's conduct[[131]](#cite_note-DBMT-131) and growing powers. Led by Amidala, Mothma, and Organa,[[127]](#cite_note-CotR-127) the Delegation hoped to make Palpatine give up his emergency powers[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128) and intended to present their petition to Palpatine once it was signed by two thousand[[127]](#cite_note-CotR-127) of their fellow legislators.[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128)

#### The Battle of Coruscant

:   "*You did well, Anakin. He was too dangerous to be kept alive.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine, to Anakin Skywalker, on the execution of Dooku[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Sidious moved forward with his plans to replace Tyranus with Skywalker as the Clone Wars entered its last phase.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b8/ChancellorsEdict-SoH.png/revision/latest?cb=20200119045533) [![Sidious moved forward with his plans to replace Tyranus with Skywalker as the Clone Wars entered its last phase.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b8/ChancellorsEdict-SoH.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20200119045533)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b8/ChancellorsEdict-SoH.png/revision/latest?cb=20200119045533) 

Sidious moved forward with his plans to replace Tyranus with Skywalker as the Clone Wars entered its last phase.

 

Deciding that it was time to make Skywalker his next apprentice, Sidious devised a plan for Palpatine to be captured in order for Skywalker to rescue him. The plan included sacrificing Darth Tyranus, who was to be killed by Skywalker, which would tempt Skywalker to the dark side and eventually lead to the young Jedi replacing Dooku as the Dark Lord's new apprentice.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) Likely through the Nexus Route,[[132]](#cite_note-Battles-132) Sidious had obtained the coordinates to Coruscant[[40]](#cite_note-Emperor_Palpatine-40) and gave them to Grievous and his fleet to jump from the Outer Rim directly to Coruscant.[[57]](#cite_note-The_Separatists-57) Sidious also had a plan to kidnap the Supreme Chancellor,[[40]](#cite_note-Emperor_Palpatine-40) which was tasked to Grievous. Sidious ordered Grievous to capture Palpatine and for Dooku to hold him hostage. Grievous and Dooku, however, were unaware of Sidious' true intentions.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

During the [Outer Rim Sieges](/wiki/Outer_Rim_Sieges "Outer Rim Sieges"), Grievous commanded a [massive invasion](/wiki/Battle_of_Coruscant "Battle of Coruscant") of Coruscant, accompanied by Dooku.[[133]](#cite_note-Lightsabers-133) Dooku, who had earlier relocated his command post to Grievous's [flagship](/wiki/Flagship "Flagship"), the *[Invisible Hand](/wiki/Invisible_Hand "Invisible Hand")*, stayed close to Grievous to ensure he was carrying out his orders; even though the cyborg general posed no threat to Sidious, he did not want any setback to his plans.[[40]](#cite_note-Emperor_Palpatine-40) While the Republic and Separatist fleets clashed above the planet, Grievous went to the ground in order to capture Palpatine, Shaak Ti and [Roron Corobb](/wiki/Roron_Corobb "Roron Corobb"), along with a clone task force were sent to protect him. Corrob and the clones fell to Grievous, while Ti managed to fight further. Grievous took the upper hand by electrifying the Jedi Master with cables, knocking her unconscious in the process. Grievous took [her lightsaber](/wiki/Shaak_Ti%27s_lightsaber "Shaak Ti's lightsaber") and fled with the captive Palpatine to the Separatist flagship *Invisible Hand*.[[133]](#cite_note-Lightsabers-133)

 [![Skywalker executed Tyranus on the orders of Chancellor Palpatine during the Battle of Coruscant.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/DeathOfTyranus.png/revision/latest?cb=20130210064225) [![Skywalker executed Tyranus on the orders of Chancellor Palpatine during the Battle of Coruscant.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/DeathOfTyranus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20130210064225)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/DeathOfTyranus.png/revision/latest?cb=20130210064225) 

Skywalker executed Tyranus on the orders of Chancellor Palpatine during the Battle of Coruscant.

 

Kenobi and Skywalker, who at the time were in the middle of [making preparations to take](/wiki/Siege_of_Mandalore "Siege of Mandalore") Mandalore, were called upon to rescue him.[[134]](#cite_note-Ahsoka-134)[[135]](#cite_note-OFNF-135) After landing in the *Invisible Hand*'s hangar, the two found Palpatine bound to a chair on the [bridge](/wiki/Bridge_(starship) "Bridge (starship)"). They were confronted by Dooku, who they entered a duel with. Dooku took out Kenobi with ease and then focused on Skywalker. They continued the duel until Skywalker cut off his hands. Disarmed and on his knees, Dooku was bested. Palpatine commended Skywalker on his accomplishment. However, he then betrayed Dooku by urging Anakin to kill him, due to Dooku having served his purpose. A horrified Dooku looked to Palpatine pleadingly, only to be met with another, more sinister urging. With one swift move, Count Dooku was beheaded. Anakin was conflicted on his actions but was comforted by Palpatine, who told him that it was a simple act of revenge in return for Dooku cutting off his arm. Beyond luring Skywalker closer to the dark side,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) the act also served to tie up the loose end Dooku would be if he lived, robbing the Jedi of the chance to question him to learn more about Sidious.[[136]](#cite_note-The_Phantom_Apprentice-136)

Skywalker went to pick up the unconscious Kenobi, to which Palpatine pleaded with the Jedi to leave his master. His plea was denied, and the three began their descent to the hangar. Meanwhile, the *Invisible Hand* was attacked by the [*Guarlara*](/wiki/Guarlara_(Venator-class) "Guarlara (Venator-class)"), with the former taking extensive damage and losing its position, momentarily falling towards that planet's surface. With the ship on its side, the three began running down an elevator shaft, only to lose their footing as the *Invisible Hand* regained its position. They managed to get out and to a hallway, where they were then captured in a ray shield. They were brought before Grievous in the control room, where R2-D2, who was also a captive, gave a distraction that allowed Kenobi and Skywalker to take control. With nowhere to run, Grievous broke open a window and found his way to the escape pods, which he activated as he fled. The ship then became caught in Coruscant's gravity well and began barreling towards the surface. Skywalker and Kenobi attempted to land it, but only managed to ease the crash. Following the crash, Palpatine and the Jedi were escorted to the Senate Building.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

#### The seduction of Anakin Skywalker

:   "*Soon I will have a* new *apprentice, one far younger and more powerful.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious, to Grievous[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![With the death of Tyranus, Sidious anticipated Skywalker's imminent conversion to the dark side and the ways of the Sith.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9a/Palp_trustme.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070114040526) [![With the death of Tyranus, Sidious anticipated Skywalker's imminent conversion to the dark side and the ways of the Sith.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9a/Palp_trustme.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20070114040526)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9a/Palp_trustme.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070114040526) 

With the death of Tyranus, Sidious anticipated Skywalker's imminent conversion to the dark side and the ways of the Sith.

 

Sidious directed Grievous to return to Utapau on the pretense[[137]](#cite_note-HC_24-137) of ensuring the safety of the increasingly irrelevant Separatist Council.[[57]](#cite_note-The_Separatists-57) In reality, he had other intentions for the general,[[137]](#cite_note-HC_24-137) whose usefulness to Sidious had come to its end.[[138]](#cite_note-HC_21-138) Unaware he was being set up again,[[57]](#cite_note-The_Separatists-57) Grievous—whose campaigns had served to distract the Jedi Order from the Sith conspiracy unfolding around them on Coruscant[[58]](#cite_note-The_Dark_Side-58)—had only one role left to play: he had to serve as bait to lure Kenobi away from Coruscant and Skywalker. Sidious did not care if Grievous or Kenobi lived or died, as his plan was ready to bring down the Republic and the Jedi[[137]](#cite_note-HC_24-137) and seduce Skywalker to the dark side.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

Sidious soon began preparing for the war's end. Sidious instructed Grievous to move the Separatists to Mustafar.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) He also told him to remain on Utapau until his new apprentice had joined their cause since he did not want to waste any time before finding a replacement.[[139]](#cite_note-Cyborg_and_Jedi-139) Skywalker, who had just been hailed as a hero for killing Count Dooku and rescuing the Chancellor, began having visions of his wife dying in childbirth. Sidious decided to use that to his advantage. Throughout the next few rotations, their relationship kept growing. Ultimately, Palpatine appointed Skywalker to be his representative to the Jedi Council.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) During what ended up becoming the last full session of the Republic Senate, the Petition of 2,000 was officially unveiled.[[128]](#cite_note-The_Rebel_Files-128) However, Palpatine still managed to find an advantage in the current political atmosphere, telling and convincing Skywalker that Amidala could have ulterior motives she was keeping secret from them both.[[140]](#cite_note-The_Long_Game-140)

Meanwhile, the Jedi began to distrust and resent the Chancellor's accumulating power and control. The Council, who was not happy with Skywalker's appointment by one not of their order, denied him the rank of "Jedi Master." This turn of events simply furthered Sidious' plans. The Council, however, decided to use this appointment as a chance to spy on Palpatine. Skywalker, who felt insulted by that demand, regretfully agreed and began to devote his time to getting to know the Chancellor better. Some Jedi, such as Mace Windu, were concerned about their relationship, seeing that it could be dangerous putting the two together. Windu ultimately noted that the dark side of the Force surrounded the Chancellor.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Sidious recounted the history of his late master as a Sith legend, leading Skywalker to drift ever closer to the dark side of the Force.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c3/Tragedy.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111028221321) [![Sidious recounted the history of his late master as a Sith legend, leading Skywalker to drift ever closer to the dark side of the Force.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c3/Tragedy.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20111028221321)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c3/Tragedy.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111028221321) 

Sidious recounted the history of his late master as a Sith legend, leading Skywalker to drift ever closer to the dark side of the Force.

 

At an opera show, Palpatine and Skywalker discussed the situation with Palpatine revealing to know that the Council wanted Skywalker to spy on him. At the same time, Skywalker, who was dealing with the fear of his wife's loss was beginning to distrust the Jedi Council. This allowed Sidious to orchestrate Skywalker's downfall; he claimed that the Jedi and the Sith were alike in nearly every way,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) setting the stage for the young Jedi to switch sides while playing to his devotion to the Jedi ideology.[[141]](#cite_note-Certain_POV_193-141) Next, Palpatine told him the story of his master, "Darth Plagueis the Wise." According to the story, Plagueis possessed such strength in the Force that he could use it to prevent the ones closest to him from dying. Skywalker asked what happened to him, to which Palpatine said that he was afraid of losing his power, but had taught his apprentice everything, and then his apprentice killed him in his sleep. Skywalker, enthralled by the story, wished to know more about this power, asking him if he himself could learn it with Palpatine stating that, though possible, such things could not be taught by members of the Order.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) Skywalker, however, was unaware that Palpatine was really talking about how he killed his mentor Plagueis, in order to lure him to the dark side.

As the situation grew worse, Skywalker went to speak with the Chancellor regarding the [Battle of Utapau](/wiki/Battle_of_Utapau "Battle of Utapau"). Anakin expressed his disappointment that he was not chosen for the assignment. Palpatine told Skywalker that the Council did not trust him and that the Jedi Council were plotting to take control of the Republic. He then revealed that he was trained in the ways of the Force, "even the nature of the dark side," the power that could save his wife Amidala from certain death. This led to Skywalker concluding that Palpatine himself was the Sith Lord the Jedi were hunting down and drawing his lightsaber. Although Skywalker considered killing Palpatine, the young Jedi was deeply conflicted realizing that he could not lose the Sith Lord as he thought he needed to learn the dark side power to "save" his wife. Stunned by the revelation, Skywalker responded by reporting Palpatine to the Jedi and went to the Jedi Council with this information.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

#### The fate of the galaxy

:   "*In the name of the Galactic Senate of the Republic, you are under arrest, Chancellor.*"  
    "*Are you threatening me, Master Jedi?*"  
    "*The Senate will decide your fate.*"  
    "*I* am *the Senate.*"  
    "*Not yet.*"
:   ―Mace Windu and Darth Sidious[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![The fate of the galaxy was decided in the battle between the Sith Lord Darth Sidious and Jedi Master Mace Windu.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3b/Vaapad.png/revision/latest?cb=20130210043146) [![The fate of the galaxy was decided in the battle between the Sith Lord Darth Sidious and Jedi Master Mace Windu.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3b/Vaapad.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20130210043146)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3b/Vaapad.png/revision/latest?cb=20130210043146) 

The fate of the galaxy was decided in the battle between the Sith Lord Darth Sidious and Jedi Master Mace Windu.

 

Mace Windu, realizing that the Jedi had been deceived by Sidious, after learning about the Chancellor's double identity from Skywalker, went to [confront](/wiki/Duel_in_Palpatine%27s_office "Duel in Palpatine's office") the Chancellor along with fellow Jedi Council Masters [Kit Fisto](/wiki/Kit_Fisto "Kit Fisto"), [Agen Kolar](/wiki/Agen_Kolar "Agen Kolar"), as well as [Saesee Tiin](/wiki/Saesee_Tiin "Saesee Tiin"). Windu and the three other Jedi boldly ignited their lightsabers and declared that he was under arrest. Igniting his own crimson lightsaber, Sidious declared the four Jedi as [traitors](/wiki/Treason "Treason") to the Republic. Letting out an inhuman wail of fury, he then lunged forward and slew Kolar and Tiin in mere [seconds](/wiki/Second "Second"), and Fisto slightly later, leaving Windu to face the Dark Lord alone. Sidious and Windu then engaged in a ferocious one-on-one duel. While the fight appeared to be even, Windu eventually disarmed him, knocked him to the floor and held him at blade point.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

Skywalker soon arrived after this and both sides tried to persuade him that the other was a traitor. Windu taunted Sidious in his defeat which prompted the Sith Lord to attempt to kill Windu with Force lightning, but Windu managed to deflect it back at Sidious, causing the Sith Lord's face to take on a hideously disfigured appearance in the process, due to the dark side energy emanating from the lightning. As a result of this, Sidious then switched his strategy to pretending to be a defenseless old man, dropping his lightning attack and proclaiming that he was too weak to carry on. Skywalker told Windu that Sidious had to stand trial, though Windu claimed that Sidious possessed far too much influence to be left alive, as he controlled both the courts and the senate. Deciding that his wife's survival was more important than his loyalty to the Jedi Order, Skywalker betrayed Windu by cutting off his lightsaber hand, giving Sidious the opening to drop his feigned weakness and throw Windu out the office window with a full barrage of Force lightning.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Darth Sidious bestowed the name Darth Vader on his new apprentice.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/42/SithTeachings-Convergence.png/revision/latest?cb=20201129074930) [![Darth Sidious bestowed the name Darth Vader on his new apprentice.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/42/SithTeachings-Convergence.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20201129074930)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/42/SithTeachings-Convergence.png/revision/latest?cb=20201129074930) 

Darth Sidious bestowed the name Darth Vader on his new apprentice.

 

Skywalker, although initially stunned by what he had done, ultimately viewed Windu's transgressions as the final act of Jedi hypocrisy that he would not tolerate, and knelt before the now-scarred Chancellor, agreeing to join the dark side on the condition that he was be shown how to save Amidala's life, thus betraying the Jedi. Sidious bestowed on the young man the Sith name of Darth Vader, promising the young apprentice that together they would discover the hidden art of preventing death.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) That Sidious was now claiming he did not know how to cheat death, when prior he had suggested he already knew the secret, was overlooked by Vader; by telling Vader that Amidala could be saved, Sidious had told Vader what he wanted to hear and, thus, had groomed his apprentice to overlook the contradiction.[[141]](#cite_note-Certain_POV_193-141) Sidious informed Vader of his intention to purge the galaxy of all Jedi, claiming that the Order was a threat to the Senate as well as the security of the Republic. Sidious ordered Vader to [attack the Jedi Temple](/wiki/Operation:_Knightfall "Operation: Knightfall") on Coruscant, and then [execute](/wiki/Mission_to_Mustafar "Mission to Mustafar") the [Separatist leaders](/wiki/Executive_Separatist_Council "Executive Separatist Council") on Mustafar. He declared that the galaxy would then return to a state of peace under the rule of the Sith.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

#### Execute Order 66

:   "*Commander Cody, the time has come. Execute Order 66.*"  
    "*Yes, my Lord.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious and [Cody](/wiki/Cody "Cody")[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Sidious ordered the Grand Army to execute Order 66, declaring every Jedi an enemy of the Republic.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/18/Execute_Order_66.png/revision/latest?cb=20121210185439) [![Sidious ordered the Grand Army to execute Order 66, declaring every Jedi an enemy of the Republic.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/18/Execute_Order_66.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20121210185439)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/18/Execute_Order_66.png/revision/latest?cb=20121210185439) 

Sidious ordered the Grand Army to execute Order 66, declaring every Jedi an enemy of the Republic.

 

While Vader led the 501st Legion's attack on the Jedi Temple, Sidious ordered the rest of the clone troopers to execute Order 66, declaring every Jedi an enemy of the Republic.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) However, to the select few of the Jedi he had secretly groomed, he offered their lives in exchange for service to him.[[86]](#cite_note-Inquisitor:_Rise_of_the_Red_Blade-86) Order 66 activated the biochips within the clones, who were programmed to kill the Jedi for treason against the state.[[142]](#cite_note-Clone_troopers_DB-142) Despite serving and forming deep relationships with the Jedi,[[8]](#cite_note-TSWB-8) the activation of their biochips by Sidious, immediately and forcibly brainwashed them into believing that the Jedi were traitors to the Republic that needed to be executed,[[143]](#cite_note-Shattered-143) resulting in the start of the [Great Jedi Purge](/wiki/Great_Jedi_Purge "Great Jedi Purge"). The Jedi were consequently betrayed and gunned down by their soldiers, although some managed to survive such as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yoda,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) and [Caleb Dume](/wiki/Kanan_Jarrus "Kanan Jarrus").[[144]](#cite_note-AND-144) Sidious also used Order 66 to compel [Clone Commander](/wiki/Clone_Commander "Clone Commander") [Rex](/wiki/Rex "Rex") to eliminate the former Jedi Ahsoka Tano, along with his former apprentice Maul who had been captured and brought to Coruscant by the 501st Legion. However, both attempts were unsuccessful as Tano freed Maul, and then subsequently freed Rex of the mind control by removing his biochip.[[143]](#cite_note-Shattered-143)

### Age of the Empire

#### Rise of the New Order

##### Consolidation of power

:   "*In order to ensure the security and continuing stability, the Republic will be reorganized into the first Galactic Empire! For a safe and secure society!*"
:   ―Darth Sidious — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c1/Palpatine-Proclamation.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250403185141)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:Palpatine-Proclamation.flac "File:Palpatine-Proclamation.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

After the Jedi Temple fell,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) Sidious arrived within and congratulated his new apprentice after affirming he had done as commanded;[[145]](#cite_note-Vader_2020_7-145) Vader had killed many Jedi during the siege, including Padawans and younglings,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) much to Sidious' delight.[[145]](#cite_note-Vader_2020_7-145) After assuring Vader he had done well, Sidious ordered his apprentice to bring peace to their newly rising empire, dispatching him to Mustafar to wipe out the Separatist leaders. Their conversation was captured by the Temple's security holograms. Sidious then contacted the Separatist Council to inform them that Vader would arrive and take care of them, although none of them were aware that Sidious had actually betrayed them and had sent Vader to kill them.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Darth Sidious began his reign as the Emperor when he officially reformed the Galactic Republic into the Galactic Empire.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/ff/Declaration.png/revision/latest?cb=20240221001415) [![Darth Sidious began his reign as the Emperor when he officially reformed the Galactic Republic into the Galactic Empire.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/ff/Declaration.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20240221001415)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/ff/Declaration.png/revision/latest?cb=20240221001415) 

Darth Sidious began his reign as the Emperor when he officially reformed the Galactic Republic into the Galactic Empire.

 

Assembling the Senate in [special session](/wiki/Special_session_of_Congress "Special session of Congress"), Sidious, as Palpatine, addressed the Republic and accused the Jedi of attempting to assassinate him and overthrow the government, using his newly scarred face as evidence. Affirming that the Jedi rebellion, as he called it, had been shut down,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) by the loyal Clone Army,[[146]](#cite_note-Vader_2017_16-146) Palpatine assured the Senate any remaining Jedi would be found and wiped away.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) Taking advantage of the fear and death he had spread across the galaxy[[22]](#cite_note-RiseFall-22) and presenting himself as the man who had ended the war[[87]](#cite_note-MoF-87) and the supposed Jedi rebellion it had been building to,[[147]](#cite_note-Dark_Lord_1-147) he [announced](/wiki/Proclamation_of_the_New_Order "Proclamation of the New Order") the Republic's reorganization into the First Galactic Empire,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12) promising a destructive conflict would never again be unleashed under its watch.[[148]](#cite_note-SWP-148) In the process, he declared himself [Emperor](/wiki/Monarchy "Monarchy") of the new regime, with little if any resistance from the majority of the senators present.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

##### Battle in the Senate Chamber

:   "*I have waited a long time for this moment, my little green friend.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious, to Yoda[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Grand Master Yoda confronted Darth Sidious in a final effort to prevent the return of the Sith to galactic dominance.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0f/Clash_of_Titans.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205062131) [![Grand Master Yoda confronted Darth Sidious in a final effort to prevent the return of the Sith to galactic dominance.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0f/Clash_of_Titans.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205062131)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/0f/Clash_of_Titans.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205062131) 

Grand Master Yoda confronted Darth Sidious in a final effort to prevent the return of the Sith to galactic dominance.

 

With Kenobi and Yoda realizing what had happened upon witnessing a recording within the Jedi Temple, Yoda [went to face](/wiki/Duel_in_the_Galactic_Senate "Duel in the Galactic Senate") the Emperor personally, while a reluctant Obi-Wan stowed away onboard Amidala's [yacht](/wiki/J-type_Naboo_star_skiff "J-type Naboo star skiff"), en route to Mustafar [to kill](/wiki/Duel_on_Mustafar "Duel on Mustafar") Vader. Upon arriving at the [working office](/wiki/Chancellor%27s_working_office "Chancellor's working office") of the [Chancellery Secretariat](/wiki/Chancellery_Secretariat "Chancellery Secretariat"), Yoda disposed of the pair of guardsmen by the entryway, surprising Sidious. Within moments, however, the Sith Lord had recollected himself, unleashing a barrage of Force lightning at the Jedi Master after a brief exchange of acknowledgement between the two. Yoda quickly recovered and Force pushed Sidious backwards. Yoda then engaged him in a duel when he refused to allow Sidious to escape. Sidious declared that Vader would become more powerful than both of them, while Yoda told Sidious that his faith in his nascent apprentice was a mistake, along with his faith in the dark side.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

The two then dueled in the Senate hall. No longer having his lightsaber shortly after, Sidious utilized the use of his Force powers by sending numerous Senate pods at the Jedi Master, which he closely dodged. Yoda eventually managed to redirect one of Sidious' pods at him, which the Sith Lord dodged. Sidious then unleashed a torrent of Force lightning at Yoda, which he was able to redirect back on him, giving the Jedi master the upper hand. However, the buildup of energy led to an explosion that caused Sidious to fall back and Yoda to take a huge fall to the ground. Luckily, Sidious managed to hang on to the pod and climb back up. While neither conquered the other, Yoda believed he had lost since he was unable to stop Sidious; the Jedi Master opted to flee, deciding to go into exile.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

##### Rescuing Vader

:   "*I sense Lord Vader is in danger.*"
:   ―Darth Sidious[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

As [Imperial shock troopers](/wiki/Imperial_shock_trooper "Imperial shock trooper") of the [Coruscant Guard](/wiki/Coruscant_Guard "Coruscant Guard") arrived in the Senate Chamber following the battle, the Emperor stood with Mas Amedda on a Senatorial pod as they searched for the Jedi Master. However, they could not find any trace of a body. The Emperor had more pressing concerns however: he had sensed that Vader, far away on Mustafar, was in danger of being destroyed. He ordered the clones to double their search for Yoda, and that his shuttle be prepared to depart.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_III-12)

 [![Sidious traveled to Mustafar to retrieve his new apprentice, Darth Vader, who was defeated by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f2/Let_The_Hate_Flow_AtG.png/revision/latest?cb=20191015013420) [![Sidious traveled to Mustafar to retrieve his new apprentice, Darth Vader, who was defeated by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f2/Let_The_Hate_Flow_AtG.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20191015013420)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f2/Let_The_Hate_Flow_AtG.png/revision/latest?cb=20191015013420) 

Sidious traveled to Mustafar to retrieve his new apprentice, Darth Vader, who was defeated by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi.
